00064         int nprocs = 0;

00066   int dump = 0;

00077   LRC_configNamespace cs[50];
00078   LRC_configNamespace cc[50];
00079 
00080   LRC_configTypes ct[9] = {
00081     {"default", "inidata", LRC_CHAR},
00082     {"default", "fs", LRC_CHAR},
00083     {"default", "nprocs", LRC_INT},
00084     {"default", "bodies", LRC_INT},
00085     {"logs", "dump", LRC_INT},
00086     {"logs", "period", LRC_DOUBLE},
00087     {"logs", "epoch", LRC_FLOAT},
00088     {"farm", "xres", LRC_INT},
00089     {"farm", "yres", LRC_INT}
00090   };
00091   int numCT = 9;
00092         
00093   inif = "sample-config"; //input file
00094         
00095   printf("\n");
00096   
00097   //Read config file. LRC will return number of namespaces.
00098   opts = LRC_parseConfigFile(inif, sep, comm, cs, ct, numCT);
00099   
00100   //You can handle any errors in the way You like.
00101   if(opts < 0) exit(1);
00102 
00103   //Here we just print all options using LRC_printAll()
00104         printf("\nALL OPTIONS [%d]: \n", opts);
00105   LRC_printAll(opts, cs);
00106 
00107   //Now let us read config file stored in HDF5
00108 
00109   //We create HDF5 file
00110   file = H5Fcreate("h5config.h5", H5F_ACC_TRUNC, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT);
00111   
00112   // Copy config file to hdf5 file
00113   LRC_writeHdfConfig(file, cs, opts);
00114 
00115   // Read hdf5 config file
00116   h5opts = LRC_hdfParser(file, cc, ct, numCT);
00117 
00118   printf("H5OPTS = %d\n", h5opts);
00119   
00120   // Print all options
00121   LRC_printAll(h5opts, cc);
00122  
00123   //Finally, we release resources.
00124   H5Fclose(file);
00125         
00126         // The tricky part is to do some conversions.
00127         // You need to handle this by hand, because we don't know
00128   // what variables You use. 
00129         printf("\nCONVERTED OPTIONS:\n");
00130         for(i = 0; i < opts; i++){
00131     if(strcmp(cs[i].space,"default") == 0 || strcmp(cs[i].space, "logs") == 0){
00132                   for(k = 0; k < cs[i].num; k++){
00133                           if(strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"period") == 0) period = atof(cs[i].options[k].value);  
00134                           if(strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"nprocs") == 0) nprocs = atoi(cs[i].options[k].value); 
00135                           if(strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"bodies") == 0) nbody = atoi(cs[i].options[k].value); 
00136                           if(strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"dump") == 0) dump = atoi(cs[i].options[k].value); 
00137                           if(strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"epoch") == 0) epoch = atof(cs[i].options[k].value); 
00138                   }
00139           }
00140     if(strcmp(cs[i].space,"map") == 0){
00141                   for(k = 0; k < cs[i].num; k++){
00142                           if(strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"xres") == 0) xres = atoi(cs[i].options[k].value);  
00143                           if(strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"yres") == 0) yres = atoi(cs[i].options[k].value); 
00144       }
00145     }
00146 
00147 
00148          // Here we just print options.
00149     if(strcmp(cs[i].space,"default") == 0 || strcmp(cs[i].space, "logs") == 0){
00150                 printf("Namespace [%s]:\n",cs[i].space);
00151                 for(k = 0; k < cs[i].num; k++){
00152                         printf("%s\t = \t",cs[i].options[k].name);
00153                         if (strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"period") == 0) printf("%.6f\n",period);
00154                         if (strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"inidata") == 0) printf("%s\n",cs[i].options[k].value);
00155                         if (strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"nprocs") == 0) printf("%d\n",nprocs);
00156                         if (strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"bodies") == 0) printf("%d\n",nbody);
00157                         if (strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"dump") == 0) printf("%d\n",dump);
00158                         if (strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"epoch") == 0) printf("%.6f\n",epoch);
00159                 }
00160     
00161                 printf("\n");
00162     }
00163     if(strcmp(cs[i].space,"map") == 0){
00164                 printf("Namespace [%s]:\n",cs[i].space);
00165                 for(k = 0; k < cs[i].num; k++){
00166                         printf("%s\t = \t",cs[i].options[k].name);
00167                         if (strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"xres") == 0) printf("%d\n",xres);
00168                         if (strcmp(cs[i].options[k].name,"yres") == 0) printf("%d\n",yres);
00169     }
00170     }
